body_content.explanation: a national park (= a large area of land protected by the government because of its natural beauty or because it has a special history) in the US state of Hawaii:
examples: The yellowjacket wasp and the Argentinian ant, for example, are attacking native insects in Haleakalā National Park.
Remember that all areas of Haleakalā National Park are fairly remote - stores, services, and lodging are all at least 30 minutes away.
